paragraphs.title: Load data
paragraphs.text:
import com.johnsnowlabs.nlp.util.io.{PageSegmentationMode, PageIteratorLevel}

OcrHelper.setScalingFactor(2.5f)
OcrHelper.setPageIteratorLevel(PageIteratorLevel.PARAGRAPH)
OcrHelper.useErosion(true, kSize = 1)
val data = OcrHelper.createDataset(spark, inputPath="../strata_demo", outputCol="region", metadataCol="metadata").cache
data.printSchema

{ // for displaying
val regions = data.select("region").collect().map(_.get(0))
regions.foreach{chunk =>
    println("---------------")
    println(chunk)}
}

paragraphs.title: Create Pipeline Stages - Tokenization
paragraphs.text:
import com.johnsnowlabs.nlp.annotators.spell.symmetric.SymmetricDeleteModel
import org.apache.spark.ml.{Pipeline, PipelineModel}


val documentAssembler = new DocumentAssembler().
setInputCol("region").
setMetadataCol("metadata").
setTrimAndClearNewLines(false)

val token = new Tokenizer().
setTargetPattern("\\S+|\n|,|\\.").
setSuffixPattern("(\n|,|\\.)\\z").
setInputCols(Array("document")).
setOutputCol("token")

val pipeline = new Pipeline().setStages(Array(documentAssembler, token)) 
val result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)

result.select("token").collect.foreach(println)

val spellChecker = SymmetricDeleteModel.load("schecker_simple").
setInputCols("token").
setOutputCol("checked_token")

val finisher = new Finisher().
setInputCols("checked_token")

val pipeline = new Pipeline().setStages(Array(documentAssembler, token, spellChecker, finisher)) 
val result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)

result.select("finished_checked_token").as[Array[String]].collect().foreach { a => 
    println("---------------")
    println(a.mkString(" "))
}
